name: Explosive Time Trials
description:
Avoid obstacles while staying above the minimum speed for as long as possible!

Controls:

Controller (recommended)
KeyboardActionRight TriggerW/UpForwardLeft Trigger
S/DownReverseLeft Stick
A/D/Left/RightSteerBSpacebarHandbrake

Handbrake + Steer:  Drift

Credits:

  • Minimalist 5x7 Pixel Font by kheftel (CC-0) https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-pixel-fonts
  • Explosion animation and sound is the one from Deltarune (I don't know the original source sorry)
  • Slanted pixel font by me
